Reviews.Title: Not everything is what it seems.
Reviews.Author: jmar "Mixed media artist, mother, and Masters...
Reviews.Content: The camera was in great condition, and all the lenses are amazing, but most of the extra things do not fit the camera. The extra battery is for the t3i and does not fit, and the 3 filters do not fit either. Generally, everything works fine, it would just be nice if all the things I paid for fit. Probably will not buy from them again.

Reviews.Title: Overall Not Bad
Reviews.Author: Dr T
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Canon T5i kit in July 2013 from Focus Camera through Amazon, I like the camera but this isn't a camera review. I wanted to discuss the Focus Kit. Everything arrived without damage but packaging was poor, when I picked it up from UPS I couldn't believe I had a $1000 purchase in this crappy box. The camera and lenses were as advertised, although the 55-250 didn't come in factory packaging. The Focus bag and tripod are cheap. The extra lenses seem okay I'm not a skilled enough photographer to judge them. The extra battery and Sony 32GB class 10 SD card a nice. Overall not a bad deal although I didn't like paying $26 for shipping (no prime deal there).

Reviews.Title: Itemized Invoice
Reviews.Author: Richard Waterbury
Reviews.Content: Nice combined package. Other reviews explain the contents, the bundle. I was quite pleased. The only suggestion I have is that there should be an itemized shipping list, an invoice. There were 17 separate items in the package. It was a complicated order. I could not believe that there was no shipping checklist for the customer to use upon opening the box. Turns out Focus did a nice job packing and all the contents were included; but I was quite worried for a couple hours until I figured out that all was in order. I actually made my own Excel checklist. I cut and pasted text from the Amazon description, parsed the text, numbered the list to come come up with 17 items, and then compared to actual box contents.1 Canon EOS Rebel T5i 18.0 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 3-inch Touchscreen and Full HD Movie Mode (Body) -2 Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS STM Zoom Lens -3 Canon EF-S 55-250mm f/4.0-5.6 IS Telephoto Zoom Lens -4 Telephoto Lens Set -5 Wide Angle Lens Set -6 3 pc Filter Kit: UV/ Polarizing filter/Fluorescent correction & Case7 32 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card -8 Focus Secure Digital USB Card Reader -9 Focus Universal Memory Card Wallet -10 Focus Pack of LCD Screen Protectors11 Additional LP-E8 Rechargeable Lithium-ion Replacement Battery Pack -12 Focus Well Protective SLR Camera Gadget Bag w/Pockets & Strap13 Focus Full Size 59" Tripod W/Case -14 Focus DVD Guide to Digital SLR Cameras -15 Focus Digital Grey Card Set for color correction - Focus Digital Grey Card Set for color correction -16 Focus 5pc Dlx Lens Care & Cleaning Kit -17 HDMI cable for HDTV

Reviews.Title: T5I CAMERA AND LENSES
Reviews.Author: Aaron J Coleman
Reviews.Content: I am new to this whole camera thing so i did as much research as possible and the bundles that are on sale at Amazon were the way to go. However you still get a bunch of stuff that you don't really need or can't use. for exam the two usb cables one is a general cable the other is this high speed gold hd cable. Second the bag is way to small for the stuff it comes will to pack in there.  and the real shocker was this 2ft x 1ft x 1ft box that came all damage to my front door. I took a bunch of picture of it before i opened the box thats openings were probably had 6-8 strips of packing tape on it. Then as I opened the box  but what should appear the entire bundle with NO packing peanuts paper nothing for protect. I think its pretty poor for a company to go cheap when your paying this much money for a product that they will not get an appropriate size box and no bubble wrap or anything to put in there for protection. The smaller boxes where all damaged and items had fallen out of them. I opened the camera box and there was a attest bubble wrap on it but the lens cap for the bod was of and the sd card was tossed in there. I was able to locate everything to test it all and it worked but the shear carelessness is disgusting.  All in I would spend the extra money to go with a different company who actually cared about packaging their products so they don't get damaged on there way to you. I give the product 4 stars and the service 2 over all they get a 3

Reviews.Title: the camera is very good
Reviews.Author: Oscar W. Revilla
Reviews.Content: The camera, lenses, batteries and memory works flawlessly, but  the additional items like the card reader and tripod are of very low quality, arrive broken or does not work at all.

Reviews.Title: Great camera Great price!
Reviews.Author: Paul Seredy
Reviews.Content: Everything was perfect! I would recommend this to anyone looking for a great deal. It was more than I exspected.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Charlotte
Reviews.Content: I'm still getting used to all of the features, but have used it to shoot stills and video. The picture quality is awesome. Camera is very sturdy.Honestly, I bought it mainly for the camera, lenses, extra battery...The tripod and bag are not top quality, but not bargain basement either. I bought a sling camera bag because I like that style and use the camera bag that came with the bundle to organize the accessories (extra battery, cleaning cloth, filters, usb/cables)Very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Wife loves it.
Reviews.Author: Matskee
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife for Christmas as she is the official picture taker.  She LOVES it.  There were so many accessories I think it overwhelmed her.  Yes some of the extras are cheap off brands, but they work.  The camera is very complicated to use.  I printed out a cheat sheet and bought her the Canon Rebel for dummies book.  It has more features than we will ever use, but it takes the best pictures I have ever seen.

Reviews.Title: good little bundle to start with
Reviews.Author: o.kay
Reviews.Content: Great starter camera and good bundle to get with accessories but just can't hold everything in the bag it came with. Everything was delivered securely..

Reviews.Title: T5i camera kit
Reviews.Author: pan
Reviews.Content: Product was as described and all parts new. Bag is not quite large enough to hold all the gadgets, lens,and Camera. I suggest getting a kit without the bag and purchase one at a store where you actually see the size of the bag. other than that i am very happy with this package.

Reviews.Title: Super service
Reviews.Author: D. Leet "Deweyaftou"
Reviews.Content: After receiving my canon EOS Rebel T5i I wasn't overly satisfied with the condition of the contents of the shipping box. So I wrote a not-so- flattering review. Little did I know that people from Amazon actually read these reviews and I received an immediate response. They were able to correct my problems and satisfy my complaints. I have since been taking beautiful pictures and couldn't be more thrilled with the results.Thank you Amazon for your customer satisfaction service.

Reviews.Title: great, with one exception
Reviews.Author: Thomas F. Remington "toureasy pilot"
Reviews.Content: great bundle; definitely cheaper than buying these items separately,  even though I had absolutely no need for another tripod.my one quarrel is with the 2x extender, which works moderately well except for the one time I would really want it: with the 55-250 zoom fully zoomed in. after several tries, I was still unable to make it focus, either using the autofocus or focuzing manually. the 2x extender is, in my opinion, worthless.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera! Great Kit!
Reviews.Author: Romance Bookaholic Traveler
Reviews.Content: I'm new to photography. I purchased the camera to photo birds for my blog.The camera is wonderful.The kit has so many great gadget to it. I watched the beginning of the DVD and I love it! What a great thing to include in a camera kit. The bag works for me. I'm a new photographer so all the lens & filters are unfamiliar to me but I'm happy they are included in the kit.  The cleaning kit,screen protectors,extra battery its good. Love it!The only problem with the kit is the tripod broke but the rest of the kit is working well. I contacted Focus Camera and the company is fixing the problem. Focus Camera is a company that stands by their product. I would recommend buying products from Focus Camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Willie
Reviews.Content: I loved this purchase, I got a great deal, and the T5I is a wonderful camera that comes with all of the equipment manuals, operates smooth and comes with very easy to install,operate  earn software. I like the lenses, but the tripod is cheap. Overall I saved some money purchasing it through amazon...... I would recommend it as a buy to anyone interested in the T5I.

Reviews.Title: QUITE IMPRESSIVE
Reviews.Author: James L. Palmer
Reviews.Content: This item was a Christmas gift.  When it was opened, the recipient was speechless.  There is everything in it that one needs from Tripod to gray card.  Of course the T5 was the central item, and Canon has really made it a top notch camera.  Its fps is indeed fast. It has HD video. It is quite nice in that it has all the adjustments that a professional needs. The back screen folds to present the back to the outside but unfolds to present the touch screen to the photographer.  I have found that the touch screen on my T4 which is almost identical is very convenient.  Anyone fortunate to get the Canon camera will be pleased and if you get this kit from Focus camera you will be thrilled.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Kit !!
Reviews.Author: intecjr
Reviews.Content: Excellent Kit !!This câmera T5i is sensacional, very good !!The accessories complement the needs of use.Only lens macro and zoom 2.2x don't is very good.I recommend this kit.

Reviews.Title: Great camera kit
Reviews.Author: Kevin Biggs
Reviews.Content: Great camera kit for the price. The camera and lenses are great. 100% satisfied with my purchase. I highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: The camera was a great deal and the bundle made it greater!
Reviews.Author: Jeanna Carol Graves "Poetry Lover"
Reviews.Content: Not only did we receive an amazing Canon EOS Rebel T5i that does everything we need it to and more as a yearbook staff, but the accessory bundle included Canon and other quality brand lens, filters, etc. We could not be happier.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Curtis Tompkins
Reviews.Content: I do lots of photography as part my job/business. I used to shoot with a Nikon 5000 and 5100 until I realized that for the money Canon hs way better cameras and lenses. The T5i is much better! The photos turn out much crisper and higher quality, especially when shooting in raw. Also the new STM lens is AMAZING! It is completely silent and extremely fast when using auto focus with video and is one of few lenses that actually have a functioning stability control. All the goodies and 55-250 lens are great too. Only thing bad I can say is that the tripod is crap and is very shaky and the bag is to small to fit all of the stuff in. But if you have another tripod and you only need to bring around your camera and the extra lens and adapters then the bag works just fine.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Carol Sloper
Reviews.Content: Not sure all of the accessories are things I'll use, but I love the camera.  It's been reliable and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Snap Shot
Reviews.Author: Jael94
Reviews.Content: It's a great deal, and the fact that they ship it fast is a great plus. Everything is new and as described. Very neatly packed, and your definitely getting your money's worth. Couldn't be happier, I highly recommend buying from them.

Reviews.Title: canon T5i
Reviews.Author: Berryman E Warren
Reviews.Content: except for the add on lenses this has been a great camera i enjoy it very much. I have had the camera about 8 months and have taken about 6,000 pictures i really like this camera

Reviews.Title: what a complete package
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: As a beginner for a DSLR this packages helps me have good start. It covers everything i will need. Good to have.

Reviews.Title: good price and good camera
Reviews.Author: TIMOTHY LIN
Reviews.Content: Received the order just as expected with all items. I only used the two lense came with original Canon. I don't think I will bother to use  other lenses came with the pack. The two batteries worked great so far especially I used viewfinder most of the time for photo shooting. with the price I paid for the pack, i won't complain on tripod and bag.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THE REBEL
Reviews.Author: Patricia S. Humphrey
Reviews.Content: I gave the camera set 5 stars, because this is an upgrade of my first Rebel and I know it to be an excellent beginner DSLR. Even if you only use it in "point and shoot" capability, the camera is way above and beyond a regular P & S. Taking a picture is instant, no hesitation causing you to lose the moment. The accessory kit is exceptional for the price.

Reviews.Title: Luckky
Reviews.Author: Luckky
Reviews.Content: Received fast. I am very happy with new camera :).Got very good deal. Now I am having fun with new camera taking cute pics for my son.

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: D. Cooper
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera, does all that we expected and does it well. My wife is having a lot of fun and enjoyment with it already, and we've only had it a few days.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T5i
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: Everything seems to be working properly..All the parts are matching and all the lens fit the camera. Nice !!!Tom C

Reviews.Title: Everything I hoped for
Reviews.Author: Tina
Reviews.Content: Love everything about this camera. Still trying to learn all of its uses. My order came on time and with all the items described. I just love it!

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T5i
Reviews.Author: Carlos Castaneda
Reviews.Content: Awesome camera! I've used the camera for a couple of months and I'm happy with the quality of the equipment and end results. THANKS...

Reviews.Title: excellent purchase
Reviews.Author: Nola
Reviews.Content: I was looking for an 18MP camera, and was inclined to go with Cannon because of previous favorable experiences and already owning one. This package has a lot to offer! Besides an excellent camera, the inclusion of two really versatile lenses plus the add-on telephoto and macro would have been worth the price. The other items really make this a bargain. The camera bag is good quality and holds everything but the tripod. The tripod is a nice, lightweight one with a carrying case -so much easier to transport to locations than my heavy one! The inclusion of a 32GB sd card and an extra backup battery is great. I shot all morning yesterday and didn't even fill a third of it. The larger lens is an excellent compromise between zoom capability and more close-up work - you don't have to be 9 feet away if something closer catches your eye. I used it at the zoo, and without changing lenses I was able to get excellent shots of both distant animals and close-ups of butterflies in the confines of the butterfly house.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Richard Andrews
Reviews.Content: The Canon EOS Rebel T5i package was an exceptional value. The camera, lenses, and accessories have all met or exceeded my expectations.

Reviews.Title: T5i
Reviews.Author: Protacio Diwata
Reviews.Content: 5 stars.... I love it, my first dslr, i need 2.8 apperture lens soon!!! Next bonus hopefully i can fulfill my hobby!!!

Reviews.Title: Nice Choice...
Reviews.Author: Luis Romero
Reviews.Content: Good Choice, Good Product, and I like very much and recommend this product because is an excellent price and bundle.

Reviews.Title: couldn't be happier
Reviews.Author: Benjamin R Holte
Reviews.Content: I am a complete novice.  My wife and I bought this for our Christmas gift to each other.  We love it so much.  the picture quality is superb and I've learned a lot since getting it.  Everything in the bundle is useful.

Reviews.Title: A gift
Reviews.Author: Fred J Carpenter
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Canon Rebel for my girlfriend for a christmas gift and she absolutely loves it!!! Was worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Love my new DSLR camera
Reviews.Author: Ange
Reviews.Content: Got this DSLR camera for Christmas and I love it!. Was going to buy it from Costco, but decided to buy it from Amazon instead. Because there were so many more accessories included for the same price. It was delivered as promised...in 2 days.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera & Lenses/ rest of the kit is mediocre
Reviews.Author: Pauline A.
Reviews.Content: Love the Canon Camera & Canon lenses, but got 2 telephoto, and zero wide angle. Tripod is poor, Bag OK, but cheap. Should have shopped for just the camera and lenses, bought the accessories elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Pictures
Reviews.Author: Shahriar Davidesfahani
Reviews.Content: This Canon EOS is amazing. Easy to hold and operate, Even my kids have come up with some great shoots. With all the accessories included with this package you can not go wrong. Every sh.ot will look profesional

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: Antonio Garcia
Reviews.Content: Really nice deal!  I don't know what some mean that the bag is too small, everything fit well on my bag and the bag is not too large nor too small.  The lenses work great and I am very happy with the overall package although the tripod is a little flimsy but it works.  Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera. Questionable accessories.
Reviews.Author: Carriegraceh
Reviews.Content: I received this bundle for Christmas and was overjoyed. The camera and extra canon lens are amazing, but it came with 2 extra lens that don't fit the camera they are Vivitar. Which is fine but you need an adapter which doesn't come with the kit. Still a great deal but I think in the description they should put that 2 of the 3 extra lens aren't canon.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T5i is a GREAT camera
Reviews.Author: Ann M. Wach
Reviews.Content: I had the Canon EOS Rebel T2i previously so my learning curve was easy. All products came in good condition. The camera bag is not big enough or strong enough to carry everything I want to have with me so I purchased a better Canon camera bag separately. I would recommend this camera to anyone who wants to have the versatility of an SLR camera.

Reviews.Title: If you like taking quality photos this is a great camera and a better value.
Reviews.Author: wagnerba03
Reviews.Content: I have had two Canon 35MM cameras that I have used for over twenty-five years and I have hada a number of inexpensive Point & Shoot cameras, but this is making my day.  Having the familitiarilty of the Canon camera with built in quality and ease.  I am very happy to have waited for the Canon Digital Camera and in some ways disappointed that I waited this long to move into the real digital era.  Canon is a winner.

Reviews.Title: T5i
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: Have had a cannon sx30 for a number of yrs... Just received T5i still learning its operation, a great camera simple to use

Reviews.Title: Self Stabalizing Lens kit makes this a good deal.
Reviews.Author: David Sandsted
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this package and my wife and family photographer is tickled pink with this package.  There are less expensive packages online, however they do not include the self stabilizing lenses.  It really is the Lens package that makes this bundle worth it.

Reviews.Title: I Love My Canon T5I
Reviews.Author: Teri
Reviews.Content: I love my new camera, it came in just 3 days!  It was complete and everything fit.  Great experience! Now I just have to learn to use it!

Reviews.Title: Best Canon Camera in my opinion!
Reviews.Author: Marina Saavedra "Spaniard Girl"
Reviews.Content: I could have purchased this camera from Best Buy as I am a Silver Member; however, the price was double just for the camera body.  This is an amazing deal.  The camera itself is great!  I was upgrading from a Canon Rebel T3i and it was worth it.  The package includes 4 Canon lenses, those alone would cost you what this whole package deal costs.  I highly recommend purchasing this Canon T5i.

Reviews.Title: canon rebel t5i digital camera with accessory bundle including camera bag and tripod
Reviews.Author: Madge Hribar
Reviews.Content: love the camera.  have taken two digital photography classes to learn how to use the camera off automatic.  however, if only taking pictures on automatic, the picture quality is wonderful.  the accessories in the package are okay and the classes taught me what and how to use several of them.  the camera bag is nice.  the tripod is a very cheap, thin metal with little stability - would not leave camera unattended if using...would keep a hand on a all times...you would hate to damage your $$$ camera while using the cheap tripod.

Reviews.Title: Camera Great--Tele-Extender and Wide Angle not so good
Reviews.Author: Dr. Martin D. Topper
Reviews.Content: The Vivitar lenses were not very good.  Tripod was a bit fragile.  Liked the camera and lenses very much. Extra battery and bag were very good.

Reviews.Title: Very good Set, very happy !!
Reviews.Author: Oliver Seitz
Reviews.Content: The bundle is really a complete set. I am not sure I will use all of the items but for sure if I need it, I have it.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Ina
Reviews.Content: Complete. All I need to start taking great pictures with perfect functionality. As a professional photographer this camera and its accessories is all I need

Reviews.Title: Good price
Reviews.Author: Joaquin Souza
Reviews.Content: Good price for all the products. Some of them are not from the best brand but for the price it worth it.

Reviews.Title: So easy to use
Reviews.Author: Dm
Reviews.Content: We absolutely love our canon T5.The pictures are so clear and the colors are vibrant!We love the multiple shots option when our son is in motion.

Reviews.Title: I am thrilled with the camera and most of all all the accessories, it was deleivered as expected
Reviews.Author: Richard DiMaria
Reviews.Content: I am thrilled with the camera and most of all all the accessories, it was deleivered as expected, great value

Reviews.Title: Nice pack!
Reviews.Author: Carlos de Paula
Reviews.Content: You wont get this pack with other price!Everything fits in the camera, the lenses are awesome and the the tripod i very light to carry around.The extra battery helps a lot.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Igor Scaliante Wiese
Reviews.Content: We really love the Canon Rebel t5i. Its is amazing camera :-). I am recommend this product, and the amazon have the best price

Reviews.Title: picture perfection
Reviews.Author: trini_tally
Reviews.Content: This entire bundle is absolutely true to what is being advertised. The bundle is made up of different brands however the important thing is that you get your Canon Rebel T5i. Its an excellent piece of equipment and I absolutely adore the touch screen feature. The telephoto lens is superb and so is everything else. The only thing missing from this bundle is a mounted flash. Other than that it's a steal of a deal. Ships fast as well. Photographers take advantage!!!!

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T5I 18.0 MP
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "carollo"
Reviews.Content: I take a lot of Jazz photography and can't use a flash. I use manual no flash and iso800 and I'm very pleased with the results. The focus is so fast even in avalible light. The LCD screen is great the way it swivels. I also like that it's not so heavy. I got the bundle and was pleased with everything that came with it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera with tons of accessories
Reviews.Author: TLL
Reviews.Content: Exceeded my expectations. The package deal has any accessory you could possibly need to take amazing pictures. Worth every penny spent.

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: R. Schneider "rook"
Reviews.Content: I have had one of the earlier versions of the Canon Rebel which work very well. The t5i is on a much grander scale even though it is similar to the original it is much easier to understand and operate.  every aspect is improved. I am very happy with this camera since I did not know what to expect , i was pleasantly surprised. I was even more thrilled because I bought it with the package deal which gave a great of added value. I would recommend spending a little extra for this because it is well worth it. The camera itself works like a charm and gives good detailed pictures.

Reviews.Title: Light weighted
Reviews.Author: Satyanarayana Mutyala
Reviews.Content: Just got my T5i, it is light weighted and almost all the same features as 4i. Have to experience more to give an apt feedback

Reviews.Title: Awesome price
Reviews.Author: moowithmeelphie
Reviews.Content: Everything came on time, nothing was broke, and it was well worth the cost. The only thing that's missing are the digital grey cards. But everything else is here, and working perfectly. Overall I was happy with this experience. I give 4 stars because of the missing item

ProductInfo.Features:
This Kit includes 17 items all with USA Warranty and manufacturer's supplied accessories
Canon EOS Rebel T5i 18.0 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 3-inch Touchscreen and Full HD Movie Mode (Body) - Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS STM Zoom Lens - Canon EF-S 55-250mm f/4.0-5.6 IS Telephoto Zoom Lens - Telephoto & Wide Angle Lens Set - 3 pc Filter Kit: UV/ Polarizing filter/Fluorescent correction & Case
32 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Focus Secure Digital USB Card Reader - Focus Universal Memory Card Wallet - Focus Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
Additional LP-E8 Rechargeable Lithium-ion Replacement Battery Pack - Focus Well Protective SLR Camera Gadget Bag w/Pockets & Strap
Focus Full Size 59" Tripod W/Case - Focus DVD Guide to Digital SLR Cameras - Focus Digital Grey Card Set for color correction - Focus 5pc Dlx Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - HDMI cable for HDTV connection - BONUS!! Free 25 Quality Prints
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T5i 18.0 MP CMOS Digital Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS STM Zoom Lens + EF-S 55-250mm f/4.0-5.6 IS Telephoto Zoom Lens + Telephoto & Wide Angle Lenses + 12pc Bundle 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
